description.ko: 건축적 형태에서 벗어나 생물학적 형상을 탐구한 이 작품은, 극단적인 기하학적 붕괴와 고속 데이터 용해 미학을 통해 인간의 실루엣이 해체되는 과정을 보여줍니다.
description.en: A departure from architectural forms into the biological, this piece explores the deconstruction of a human silhouette through extreme geometric corruption and high-speed data-melt aesthetics.

prompt: A hyper-detailed profile of a human bust composed entirely of razor-sharp, interlocking black obsidian polygons and crystalline white structures. The form is experiencing a violent 'data-melt,' with massive horizontal displacement glitches and pixel-sorting artifacts tearing the facial features into a chaotic stream of monochrome geometric fragments. High-contrast 8k rendering with intense raytraced reflections and harsh shadows. The background is a dense field of digital scanlines and rhythmic geometric noise. Sharp angles, global illumination, and textured digital corruption define the volumetric form in a sterile, high-bitrate void.
